                                        int decimalPlaces)

round

public static long round(double val)
Apply rounding such that: round(4.5) == 5L round(-4.5) == -5L round(4.49) == 4L round(3.51) == 4L round(-4.49) == -4L round(-3.51) == -4L

roundToFixedPoint

public static long roundToFixedPoint(double val,
                                     int decimalPlaces)
Return a long value representing a fixed-point value with the given number of decimal places. roundTo(x, 0) == round(x) roundTo(4, 1) == 40L roundTo(4.45, 1) == 45L roundTo(-4.45, 1) == -45L roundTo(-4.455, 2) == -446L roundTo(4.455, 2) == 446L Supports either 0, 1, 2, 3, -1, -2, or -3 decimal places. Half-integers will be rounded up.
